scripts.postbuild: mv build/404/index.html build/404.html && rm -r build/404 && svelte-sitemap --domain https://kilicbaran.github.io --trailing-slashes true -i 'google*' -i 'blog/tag/**' -i '404*'
scripts.deploy: cd build && git init && git branch -m main && git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push -f git@github.com:kilicbaran/kilicbaran.github.io.git main:gh-pages
